game.name: Hillbilly Apocalypse
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Once upon a time when all planet was in great danger the unknown enemy turned everyone into zombies. Chaos came. The rest of people are had to survive. It seems that everything has come to an end...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Once upon a time when all planet was in great danger the unknown enemy turned everyone into zombies. Chaos came. The rest of people are had to survive. It seems that everything has come to an end...

reviewHighlights.text: The game shows how bloody the apocalypse can be. Here you go through the level, and in the location at every step there is only meat, meat-meat-meat....
